generated.css: @import #particlesjs{position:absolute;width:100%;z-index:1}#hero #video-container{position:absolute;top:0;left:0;height:100vh;width:100%;overflow:hidden}#hero #video-container 10px black)}#hero #scroll-arrow{margin:0 auto;text-align:center;animation:pulse 3s ease-in-out infinite}#hero #scroll-arrow a{color:rgba(97,129,165,.5);text-decoration:none}#hero #scroll-arrow a:hover{cursor:pointer}#sideNav{position:fixed;top:50%;transform:translateY(-50%);padding-left:1rem;z-index:5}#sideNav li:last-of-type{margin-bottom:0}#sideNav ul li a{cursor:pointer;color:rgba(97,129,165,.5)}#sideNav ul li a i:hover{transition:color .2s ease-in}#sideNav ul li a
